name: Gumbo
description: Getting its name from the classic bubble gum flavor, Gumbo is a perfect medicine for the evenings and has a smooth taste and finish. Gumbo is great for treatment of muscle spasms, sleeplessness, helpful with overall pain management as well as serving as an appetite stimulant.
attributes_title: Euphoric, Relaxed, Happy, Talkative, Sleepy, Pain, Stress, Insomnia, Depression, Inflammation, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Headache, Paranoid
